text: Sten Bertil Ingemund Bengtsson (30 January 1919 - 12 April 2000) was a Swedish Social democratic politician. He was the Speaker of the Riksdag from 1979 to 1988.Sandblom, Clas-Göran (1994): Ingemund - en biografi. Förlag Utsikten. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Speakers of the Riksdag
title: Ingemund Bengtsson
